医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究人员创办初创公司，利用牛奶外泌体彻底改变靶向药物输送内布拉斯加州的两名研究人员成立了一家初创公司，旨在将一种创新方法推向市场，将治疗药物、基因编辑工具、质粒等输送到人体的目标部位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Researchers-launch-startup-to-revolutionize-targeted-drug-delivery-using-milk-exosomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Researchers-launch-startup-to-revolutionize-targeted-drug-delivery-using-milk-exosomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=176b6eb8-6d1f-4e08-be64-2cf836c66242 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 11:15:35 -0500 Researchers launch startup to revolutionize targeted drug delivery using milk exosomes
新的临床试验旨在延长胆管癌患者的生存期由伦敦大学学院 (UCL) 和伦敦大学学院医院 (UCLH) 赞助的一项新临床试验旨在通过针对肿瘤遗传特征专门定制的疗法来延长部分胆道癌症患者的生存期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-clinical-trial-aims-to-extend-survival-for-bile-duct-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-clinical-trial-aims-to-extend-survival-for-bile-duct-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13cfb2c0-2322-4aa6-8e0b-b290139c8872 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 11:05:24 -0500 New clinical trial aims to extend survival for bile duct cancer patients
新研究将宫颈阴道微生物群与衣原体感染风险增加联系起来宫颈阴道微生物群在衣原体感染中的作用强调了分子分类的必要性，以加强预防和治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-study-links-cervicovaginal-microbiome-to-increased-risk-of-Chlamydia-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-study-links-cervicovaginal-microbiome-to-increased-risk-of-Chlamydia-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b69f8458-9873-433a-b829-ee2526feafcf Fri, 17 Jan 2025 09:32:00 -0500 New study links cervicovaginal microbiome to increased risk of Chlamydia infections
研究揭示出生顺序和性格如何影响父母的偏爱兄弟姐妹之间有着一种独特的联系，这种联系是由共同的记忆、家庭仪式和偶尔的争吵建立起来的。但如果问几乎所有有兄弟姐妹的人，你可能会发现一个长期存在的争论：谁是最受欢迎的？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-reveals-how-birth-order-and-personality-influence-parental-favoritism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-reveals-how-birth-order-and-personality-influence-parental-favoritism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76ce8209-a4f2-4be0-afb3-ec25ed64ea64 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 08:55:26 -0500 Study reveals how birth order and personality influence parental favoritism
颗粒酶 K+ CD8+ T 细胞被确定为复发性气道炎症的关键驱动因素研究人员发现了 CD8+ 记忆 T 细胞的致病亚群，可促进气道组织炎症和复发性呼吸道疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Granzyme-K2b-CD82b-T-cells-identified-as-key-drivers-of-recurrent-airway-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Granzyme-K2b-CD82b-T-cells-identified-as-key-drivers-of-recurrent-airway-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4f2dc45-f09e-467c-9670-d101e5b5a1c2 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 08:55:00 -0500 Granzyme K+ CD8+ T-cells identified as key drivers of recurrent airway inflammation
研究发现炎性体蛋白可通过调节干细胞预防癌症根据威尔康奈尔医学研究人员的一项临床前研究，一组称为炎性体的免疫蛋白可以通过去除血液干细胞表面的某些受体并阻断癌症基因活性来帮助防止血液干细胞恶性化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Inflammasome- Proteins-found-to-prevent-cancer-by-regulate-stem-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Inflammasome- Proteins-found-to-prevent-cancer-by-regulate-stem-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b87c0f97-af9a-41bf-a9a0-ec00dd403654 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 08:12:57 -0500 Inflammasome proteins found to prevent cancer by regulating stem cells
卡路里标签可以帮助人们选择稍微少一点的卡路里一项新的 Cochrane 评论发现，菜单和产品上食物的卡路里标签会导致人们选择略少卡路里的食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Calorie-labeling-can-help-people-choose-slightly-fewer-calories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Calorie-labeling-can-help-people-choose-slightly-fewer-calories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1e2524f-c7ac-4aae-a68d-57b376dced6c Fri, 17 Jan 2025 07:13:48 -0500 Calorie labeling can help people choose slightly fewer calories
研究发现肠道细菌可以减少糖尿病小鼠和人类的糖摄入量过多的糖摄入与多种非传染性疾病有关，包括肥胖、心血管疾病、代谢综合征和 2 型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Intestinal-bacter-found-to-reduce-sugar-intake-in-diabetic-mice-and- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Intestinal-bacter-found-to-reduce-sugar-intake-in-diabetic-mice-and- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37b4c0d3-5a5b-4390-88c1-3ebddc0eed60 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 06:58:17 -0500 Intestinal bacterium found to reduce sugar intake in diabetic mice and humans
通过突破性的基因研究诊断出超过 500 名欧洲患者​超过 500 名病情不明的欧洲患者通过新的基因研究得到了诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Over-500-European-病人-diagnosed-through-groundwriting-genic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Over-500-European-病人-diagnosed-through-groundwriting-genic-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cd94e81-15c0-4852-8e5a-ffb7776bd95b Fri, 17 Jan 2025 06:20:07 -0500 Over 500 European patients diagnosed through groundbreaking genetic research
亨廷顿病的早期大脑变化在症状出现前二十年就被发现伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，亨廷顿舞蹈症患者的大脑发生了微妙的变化，可以通过先进的成像、血液和脊髓液分析来检测，这种变化比临床运动诊断早了大约二十年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Early-brain-changes-in-Huntingtone28099s-disease-Detected-two-decades-before-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Early-brain-changes-in-Huntingtone28099s-disease-Detected-two-decades-before-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75f7bde2-b592-4788-bf21-2628f5a1e27b Fri, 17 Jan 2025 06:08:52 -0500 Early brain changes in Huntington’s disease detected two decades before symptoms
